name: Tensai
tagline: We Help You Digitize Your Ideas
description:
In Tensai we like innovation and technology. 
We always seek to combine the best of both in the solutions we provide to our customers. 
We Develop Microsites & Advertising Apps for Social Networks, Augmented Reality Apps, Corporate Sites with Responsive Design for Mobile. 
We also offer the best Hosting service. We handle our own servers with immediate response.
